content: मत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [मन्-क्त] {@--1@} Thought, believed, supposed. {@--2@} Considered, regarded, deemed, looked upon. {@--3@} Esteemed, honoured, respected; <ls>R. 2. 16</ls>, <ls n="R.">8. 8.</ls> {@--4@} Commended, valued. {@--5@} Conjectured, guessed. {@--6@} Meditated upon, thought of, perceived, recognised. {@--7@} Thought out. {@--8@} Intended, aimed at. {@--9@} Approved, sanctioned. {@--10@} Wished or hoped for. {@--11@} Perceived, observed, known, understood. (See मन्). --तं {@--1@} A thought, idea, opinion, belief, view: निश्चितं मतमुत्तमं <ls n="R.">18. 6</ls>; केषांचिन्मतेन &c. {@--2@} Doctrine, tenet; creed, religious belief; ये मे मतमिदं नित्यमनुति ष्ठंति मानवाः <ls>Bg. 3. 31.</ls> {@--3@} Advice, instruction, counsel. {@--4@} Aim, design, intention, purpose. {@--5@} Approbation, sanction, commendation. {@--6@} Knowledge.
